attributes.action: Eliminate school uniform to increase student moral and overall well-being
attributes.additional_details: Recently the way schools are enforcing dress codes has been take to far with young girls being thoroughly inspected by male teachers and made to feel intimidated
attributes.background: Allow students to wear own clothing with the rule of no high end brands to prevent bullying and inequality

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871

If you're concerned about your school's uniform policy, or the behaviour of any teachers, you should raise this with your school or parents.

If you or anyone you know needs advice about a problem at school you could contact Childline, a charity that provides advice to children and young people: https://www.childline.org.uk/
